body:
@davecheney 
I trimmed the program down to just net.listen and it fails. The significant line in strace is:
SYS_326(0x2, 0x80801, 0, 0, 0) = -1  ENOSYS (Function not implemented). 

As minux indicates, the minimum version of linux for the PPC64 is most likely 2.6.37.  (This issue might be glance into the future.   When targeting a different OS/ARCH, should there also be a version so that the compiler can account for such things?)
